channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- PureApplication System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- PureApplication System

item.title: CVE-2019-4234|2024-09-16T16:48:14.124Z -- ibm -- pureapplication%20system
item.description: IBM PureApplication System 2.2.3.0 through 2.2.5.3 weakness in the implementation of locking feature in pattern editor. An attacker by intercepting the subsequent requests can bypass business logic to modify the pattern to unlocked state. IBM X-Force ID: 159416.
